resourceInfo.displayName: T. gondii ME49 contig sequence and annotation from Genbank
resourceInfo.description: Toxoplasma gondii ME49 sequence and annotation from Lis Caler at the J. Craig Venter Institute (JCVI).

Genome sequence and annotation for T. gondii apicoplast provided by David Roos (University of Pennsylvania), Jessica Kissinger (University of Georgia).The apicoplast genome of T. gondii RH (Type I) strain is 34996 bps long (GeneBank accession #: NC_001799). Click here to view a map of the T. gondii apicoplast. Contact: David Roos droos@sas.upenn.edu.
